mapper.insert: insert into SOLDIER ( userID, name, height, weight, bodyGrade, birthDate, desiredPosition, desiredDate, certificate) values ( #{userID} , #{name}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bodyGrade}, #{birthDate}, #{desiredPosition}, #{desiredDate}, #{certificate})
mapper.update: UPDATE SOLDIER SET name = #{name}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, bodyGrade = #{bodyGrade}, birthDate = #{birthDate}, desiredPosition = #{desiredPosition}, desiredDate = #{desiredDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SOLDIER ORDER BY id DESC
